title: All guides: Chinese Medicine: Websites and social media
author: Tracey Love
description: This guide will assist RMIT students who are studying Chinese medicine.
cleaned_text: Students studying Chinese Medicine at RMIT University undertake placements at the RMIT Health Clinic in Bundoora and the Nanjing University of Chinese Medicine in China. Stay up to date with recent developments in Chinese Medicine: News highlights: Evaluate your sources using the [C.R.A.A.P test](https://emedia.rmit.edu.au/learninglab/content/evaluate-information-sources) to find reliable, quality information. CURRENCY When was it created? RELEVANCE Is it on my topic? AUTHORITY Is it by an expert? ACCURACY Is it correct and reliable? PURPOSE Why was it created? Fact checking is an important skill when using websites and social media. Learn how to assess and verify your sources with RMIT's [Fact Checking](https://rmit.libguides.com/factchecking) guide.
